mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS user_no, CRCLM_CD AS crclm_cd, KORN_FLNM as stu_name, TELNO as stu_tel , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{year }, 3),SUBSTRING(#{half }, 3),SUBSTRING(CRCLM_CD,3),LPAD(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CRCLM_CD ORDER BY CRCLM_CD), 2, '0')) AS stdnt_no FROM APPL_INFO WHERE CRCLM_YEAR = #{year } and CRCLM_HALF = #{half }
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO u JOIN APPL_INFO a ON u.USER_NO = a.USER_NO SET u.USER_ID = a.STDNT_NO, u.PSWD = SUBSTRING(u.TELNO, 8) WHERE a.CRCLM_YEAR = #{year } AND a.CRCLM_HALF = #{half }
mapper.select:
SELECT KORN_FLNM as stu_name, TELNO as stu_tel, STDNT_NO as stu_no, CRCLM_CD AS crclm_cd , CASE WHEN (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE STDNT_NO = USER_INFO.USER_ID) != ' ' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ID_YN FROM APPL_INFO WHERE CRCLM_YEAR = #{year } and CRCLM_HALF = #{half }
AND (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE STDNT_NO = USER_INFO.USER_ID) != ' '
AND (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE STDNT_NO = USER_INFO.USER_ID) IS NULL
ORDER BY CRCLM_CD
